/* eslint-disable template-curly-spacing */
 
import {css} from "emotion";
 
import styleMemoize from "../../utils/style-memoize";
import getMenuVars from "./menu.var";
 
function getMenuItemStyle(variation,menuVars) {
  const {
    getColor,
  } = menuVars;
 
  const color = getColor(variation);
 
  return `
    &.active {
      border-color: ${color} !important;
      color: ${color} !important;
    }
  `;
}
 
export const menuItemVariation = styleMemoize((variation)=>{
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
 
  const {
    getColor,
  } = menuVars;
 
  const color = getColor(variation);
 
  return css`
    ${getMenuItemStyle(variation,menuVars)}
    .inverted &.active {
      background-color: ${color}
    }
  `;
});
 
export const menuVariation = styleMemoize((variation)=>{
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
 
  const {
    getColor,
    invertedColoredDividerBackground,
    invertedColoredActiveBackground
  } = menuVars;
 
  const color = getColor(variation);
 
  return css`
    .item {
      ${getMenuItemStyle(variation,menuVars)}
    }
    &.inverted {
      background-color: ${color};
    }
    &.inverted .item:before {
      background-color: ${invertedColoredDividerBackground};
    }
    &.inverted .active.item {
      background-color: ${invertedColoredActiveBackground} !important;
    }
 
  `;
});
